alert.note: Alert for Bremer; Butler (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:06PM CDT until August 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bremer County in northeastern Iowa... Northern Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marble Rock, or 11 miles northwest of Allison, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Waverly, Allison, Clarksville, Shell Rock, Greene, Plainfield, Waverly Municipal Airport, and Allison Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
